text: to create the perfect atmosphere for relaxation dining and people watching at las vegas central perk all thats needed is an orange couch gunthers beverages cuisine tunes artwork and complimentary internet connectivity

i am new to the noodle world but i must say that i was very impressed with the service and the quality of the food i tried the green bean tempura and was completely blown away by its deliciousness the ramen bowls were equally impressive and the duck bowl was a standout i highly recommend this establishment to anyone who is looking for a musttry dining experience i eagerly anticipate my next visit
as someone who hails from new orleans i must admit that i have never felt more disappointed in my life the oysters were unimpressively small measuring only as big as my pinky nail

we made a reservation for this hotel based on reviews that turned out to be inaccurate upon arrival we found that the hotel was seedy and rundown with rude staff and female trafficking right at the front door although it may have met the needs of college guys it was not the best option for couples or families
the burgers were unremarkable but the soggy fries werent worth the effort despite the great service

while living in new jersey before moving to arizona i frequently encountered people who were rude arrogant and had a cold service attitude now that i have arrived in arizona i find that the people here are not as welcoming as i had hoped i wish they would lighten up and be more friendly as i do not plan on returning to this location

starbucks is starbucks but this particular location tends to become very crowded and often appears to be understaffed the seating options are limited making it difficult to find a quiet spot to sit however i would recommend visiting the starbucks locations at target or harris teeter across the street for faster service and the same quality

more bar than restaurant the food is what you would expect from a bar they have a dartboard they have their own draft called hoot  available by pitcher interesting decor  movies sports etc excellent friendly service
